bibl.title: The text of the Constitutio Antoniniana and the three other decrees of the emperor Caracalla contained in the Papyrus Gissensis 40
bibl.note: This article gives the slightly altered text of a paper read to the Cambridge Philological Society in November 1939 (cf. Cambridge University Reporter of January, 16, 1940, pp. 503-504).
bibl.seg: Heichelheim Fritz M., The Text of the Constitutio Antoniniana and the Three Other Decrees of the Emperor Caracalla Contained in Papyrus Gissensis 40.
